content.raw:
Since you changed all the other `ws` to `<workspace>`, we should change this one too.

Personally, I prefer tutorials to have commands that can be directly copy-pasted, so I prefer keeping `ws`. The assumption is that if a user knows enough to understand that `<workspace>` should be changed to something else, they should also be able to change `ws` if they want to .
content.html:
Since you changed all the other ws to <workspace>, we should change this one too.

Personally, I prefer tutorials to have commands that can be directly copy-pasted, so I prefer keeping ws. The assumption is that if a user knows enough to understand that <workspace> should be changed to something else, they should also be able to change ws if they want to .
